1.title: The girls

12.content:
Kate was an aspiring model who had it all, beauty, long blonde hair, smooth skin, piercing green eyes, and bones. Kate was utterly bereft of any flabby flesh. The devoted girl deprived herself of necessary calories which prompted her concerned mother to take action. Kate's mother, Naomi was a healthy 220 pound woman cooking sumptuous meals for her emaciated daughter only to have her turn them down. Watching her daughter's body exhibit the rims of her bones, Naomi seeked council, which she found in a peculiar camp. The camp specialized in fattening girls, promising obesity in even the most recalcitrant of girls. Naomi quickly acted and enrolled her anorexic daughter. Knowing full well Kate would object, Naomi lied to het saying it was a modeling camp, Kate immediately accepted.

At the present Kate is located at the camp amongst dozens of other girls destined to be fattened. Like Kate, the other girls were lied to as well. The misconceptions varied from sports camps from parents who wanted their daughter to veer away from athleticisms, to weight loss camps for girls far too obsessed with being thin, to even an average summer camp. The camp was aware that most of their campers were purposely mislead so they remained ambiguous about their intentions.

Currently Kate is...
12.title: Kate

125.content:
Kate is sitting alongside the other girls listening to an introduction.

"Hi girls!" greeted a cheerful portly woman.

"Huh she's kindof fat for a modeling instructor. Then again some ladies do let themselves go when they retire." Kate thought staring at the hefty counslor.

"I hope you ready for a summer filled with fun and activities!" enticed the woman provoking the girls to cheer.

"I wonder what type of modeling activities they have planned." Kate wondered.

"Okay now before I tell you the camp's schedule, counselors will be passing out pills for you to take."

"Oh boy diet pills! Like the real models!" Kate thought quickly taking a pill without hesistation.

"Performance enhancing drugs!" thought others which couldn't be any farther from the truth. The pills that the oblivious girls were taking were hyper appetite enhancers and metabolism crushers.

"To fully benefit from our camp you'll need to take these pills everyday. Now lets get started, you'll be assigned to a cabin with other girls. In the cabin you'll find a refridgerator, a television with game system, and a large comfy bed for each girl." said the woman purposely leaving out the lack of mirrors(so they won't notice their growing body) and scented candles which incite cravings. Also how the fridge was stocked with rich foods.
"Everyday you'll participate in an activity, followed by a compulsory nutritious meal. You'll have lots of free time to do whatever you want. You could eat at the mess hall, play video games at our arcade or in your cabin, you could relax in the spa or in our hot springs. We end each day with a late night dinner followed immediately by bed." instructed the counselor omitting details such as the hot springs and spa are very foggy preventing girls from seeing themselves or others, and the massive servings at each mandatory meal, and that the arcade was filled with tempting vending machines.
"Now for your uniforms you'll be wearing our camp's signature skirt and tank top and for swimming you'll be issued a fashionable bikini. As of tonight any other clothes are forbidden." she said leaving out that the clothes are incredibly elastic and able to stretch to any size, preventing awareness of their gains.

"Oh wow the uniform sure is cute! I wouldn't expect any less from models." Kate smirked.

As the lecture concluded, Kate...
125.title: receiving an introduction and pills

151.title: A softball team whose coach thinks they are too...

1512.content: Kenzie stepped off the bus with her softball teammates. “What even is this place?” She asked. Caroline responded “I have absolutely no idea. Maybe it’s-“ “I don’t know, but someone’s cooking and it smells soooo good.” interrupted Caitlin. The girls checked in to camp, and proceeded to their rooms. As her friends finished unpacking their things in the rooms on either side of hers, Kenzie looked in the large mirror in her room. She looked at her tiny figure, having no idea what would soon become of it. Her (relatively) long legs were skinny and toned, there was barely a belly to speak of on her, and even though her ass was small, it still had a nice shape to it. She didn’t know it yet, but before too long she would have a better summer body than ever before. While looking around her room, she noticed something that she had never seen at any other camp: a full-sized refrigerator. Kenzie remarked to herself how nice that was, but didn’t think anything of it. Before she could really get settled in, somebody came knocking on her door. Caitlin yelled out “Kenz, come explore the camp with me! Where do you want to go first?”
1512.title: Mackenzie
